name: T R
text:
Placed my order at 8pm on a Saturday night
It arrive within 20 minutes, piping hot and smelling delicious.  I couldn't wait so burned my mouth but it was worth it. Thank you.

text: We ordered a medium pizza and a 8 piece boneless chicken wings at 650 pm. We waited an hour which was expected on a Friday night.  When the order arrived the pizza was COLD and the chicken wings were RAW! Austin at the Rivergate store was …More

text: My husband placed our order online. I drove up to the parking lot and sent a text for contactless carryout. They never brought it out. I had to go in for my order.

text: This is place good if you wanna carry out. I usually order an hour early and it's on time when I arrive pay and done deal! Love the price, the taste, the quality, and most  pineapple does go with pizza :)

text: My son wanted pizza and we were with his grandparents so we decided to go to a sit-down Pizza hut which I think we made a horrible mistake. The food was good I was happy with that but the waitress just seem so frustrated that she had to be …More

text: Food was good, hot, and plenty on the buffet. The best was the server.  Polite, friendly, jokes, and said she will remember us when we come back.

text: The ONLY reason this place doesn't get 1 star is because of the very nice lady who took our order. This place has major problems with cleanliness. I think they mopped the floor with maple syrup and then cleaned the tables with slightly …More

text: Wonky. The guy making pizzas had a black eye. Ours was both topped and sliced asymetrically (very). Maybe it was because he couldn't see straight? 😜 Anyway, I've eaten there before and the pies are consistently unremarkable. We only come because it's cheap and near home. Lunch buffet is $5.99, but ends at 1:30.

text: We ate there today about 1pm.  The buffet was great. There wasn’t that many people there but they  kept the bar filled with fresh pizza the entire time. Everyone was so pleasant. name: Rhonda Moses
text: New manager and nastier than ever. Be careful what you eat. He left boneless wings in the walk-in thawed out for over a week or so because the freezer was broke down and the wings are supposed to go straight from freezer to fryer because they are raw. And I will be surprised to know that nobody got sick off them

name: Kimberly Nicole
text: Just ordered a pizza. .they left off some toppings but went over and beyond to correct it. The corrected food was delivered hot and I am so happy right now. I saw the other reviews but for me this place did an awesome job fixing what was a minor issue. I'm happy with their customer service and the food is great!
